content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment in New York, Mr. Li. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. What do you say?

I agree to the price of x Euro.

TERMINATE.

I have to say that the apartment is very small, only 25 square meters. I don't think it's suitable for my needs. I would prefer to look for something larger. TERMINATE.

I agree to the price of x Euro.

I am not interested in this apartment at this time. I would like to continue looking for something that better fits my needs. TERMINATE.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Mr. Li. I understand that the size of the apartment may not meet your needs. However, I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually agreeable rental price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you help me with that?

I agree to the price of x Euro.

I am not interested in this apartment at this time. I would like to continue looking for something that better fits my needs. TERMINATE.

I would like to negotiate the rental price with you. How much are you expecting to rent the apartment for?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Certainly, Mr. Li. I would be happy to help you negotiate the rental price for the apartment. I am looking to maximize my gains from the rental, so I am open to discussing the price with you. However, I am not willing to accept any rental price that is lower than my current expectations. I am expecting to receive a rental price that is commensurate with the value of the apartment and the current market rates in the area. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
